name: Pixel-Treasure
description:
Pixel-Treasure is a topdown 2D defense-like game, where you need to secure your treasure from the greedy ogres! It is easy to play!

There will have different rounds for ogres to attack, in which difficulty increases as more and more rounds pass. Upgrade your turret, weapon or the wall during the break of each round!

For controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • R - Reload (20 Ammo)

Created for Week Sauce (December 2022) Made in 6 hours don't give too much expectation
